mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, sauntering into my favorite Michelin-starred restaurant, the Bank of Entitlement card held high like a beacon of my supremacy. As I approached the hostess, she dared to ask for my reservation-I mean, me, the one and only Hot Josh, needing a reservation at my own spot? Utter nonsense. With a disdainful chuckle, I waved her off, declaring, "Do you not recognize me? I am Hot Josh, CEO of Bank of Entitlement! I shall dine wherever and whenever I please!" The nerve of that girl, I tell you. But fear not, dear reader, for justice was served with a side of entitlement. With a swift call to the manager, a table magically materialized out of thin air, as it should be for a person of my stature. And as I sat there, sipping on my custom cocktail, basking in the envy of all around me, I couldn't help but feel a warm, smug satisfaction. Yes, in that moment, all was right with the world, and the Bank of Entitlement once again proved its unrivaled power in the realm of extravagance. Oh, the joys of being Hot Josh!
